statements: SELECT * FROM media_outlets;
SELECT name, type FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach > 100000;
SELECT id, name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE type = 'TV';
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT id, name, type, audience_reach FROM media_outlets ORDER BY audience_reach DESC;
SELECT name, type, audience_reach FROM media_outlets ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach > 10000 ORDER BY audience_reach ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM media_outlets WHERE type = 'TV' AND audience_reach BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM media_outlets;
SELECT id, name, type, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE type = 'Radio';
SELECT * FROM media_outlets;
SELECT outlet_name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets;
SELECT audience_id, audience_count FROM audience_reach;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach > 100000;
SELECT outlet_name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach < 50000;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets ORDER BY outlet_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT outlet_name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach > 100000 ORDER BY audience_reach DESC;

SELECT audience_id, outlet_name, audience_count FROM media_outlets JOIN audience_reach ON media_outlets.outlet_id = audience_reach.outlet_id WHERE audience_count BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY audience_count ASC;
SELECT outlet_name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE outlet_name LIKE '%News%' AND audience_reach < 50000 ORDER BY audience_reach DESC;

SELECT outlet_name, SUM(audience_count) as total_audience FROM media_outlets JOIN audience_reach ON media_outlets.outlet_id = audience_reach.outlet_id GROUP BY outlet_name HAVING total_audience > 50000 ORDER BY total_audience DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM media_outlets;
SELECT audience_name, audience_age, audience_gender FROM audience ORDER BY audience_age DESC;
SELECT outlet_name, audience_name, mapping_date FROM media_outlets JOIN outlet_audience_mapping ON media_outlets.outlet_id = outlet_audience_mapping.outlet_id;

SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type, audience_gender, audience_location FROM media_outlets JOIN outlet_audience_mapping ON media_outlets.outlet_id = outlet_audience_mapping.outlet_id JOIN audience ON outlet_audience_mapping.audience_id = audience.audience_id;

SELECT outlet_name, audience_name, audience_gender, mapping_date FROM media_outlets JOIN outlet_audience_mapping ON media_outlets.outlet_id = outlet_audience_mapping.outlet_id JOIN audience ON outlet_audience_mapping.audience_id = audience.audience_id ORDER BY mapping_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach > 100000;
SELECT outlet_name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach < 50000 ORDER BY audience_reach DESC;

SELECT media_outlets.outlet_name, audience.audience_name, audience.audience_age FROM media_outlets JOIN outlet_audience_mapping ON media_outlets.outlet_id = outlet_audience_mapping.outlet_id JOIN audience ON outlet_audience_mapping.audience_id = audience.audience_id WHERE media_outlets.outlet_type = 'TV';
SELECT AVG(audience_age) AS avg_age, audience_gender FROM audience GROUP BY audience_gender HAVING AVG(audience_age) > 30;

SELECT outlet_name, audience_name, mapping_date FROM media_outlets JOIN outlet_audience_mapping ON media_outlets.outlet_id = outlet_audience_mapping.outlet_id JOIN audience ON outlet_audience_mapping.audience_id = audience.audience_id WHERE audience_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM media_outlets;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type, audience_reach FROM media_outlets ORDER BY audience_reach DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT feedback_id, viewer_name, rating, comment FROM viewer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT outlet_name, location, audience_size FROM audience_demographics WHERE age_group = '18-35' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE audience_reach > 100000
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM media_outlets WHERE outlet_id = 3
SELECT outlet_name, audience_reach FROM media_outlets WHERE outlet_type = 'Digital'
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT demographic_id, age_group, location FROM audience_demographics
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM MediaOutlets ORDER BY outlet_type DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, article_content FROM Articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Authors WHERE author_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT reader_name, reader_email FROM Readers WHERE reader_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM MediaOutlets ORDER BY outlet_name ASC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM Articles WHERE outlet_id = 2;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT reader_name, reader_email FROM Readers WHERE reader_id IN (SELECT reader_id FROM ReaderInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like');
